imdb.title: Onegai Teacher
imdb.plot: An alien who becomes a teacher, and a student start a relationship and have to keep it all secret.

episodes.title: Oshiete teîchâ (Teach Me, Teacher)
episodes.plot: Kei witnesses a UFO landing when he was out on the lake. An alien appears in a X-File Style appearing and he panics, and he poorly attempts to escape. After wake up from a nigthmare (or Kei thinks that thing is), Kei later discovers that the alien is his new homeroom teacher, as well as his new neighbor. Is a Close Encounter of the Funny Kind

episodes.title: Mô, omuko ni ikemasen (I Can't Get Married Anymore)
episodes.plot: After being teleported into the gym closet for much a needed-talk, Kei and Mizuho are stuck when the door becomes locked. During this, Mizuho talks about her and Kei confess to Mizuho about the Stand Still. Later, they are found by Minoru, Konoha and the Principal. In an attempt to save Mizuho's job, Kei's uncle lies to the principal, saying that Kei and Mizuho are married. Married?, No problem.

episodes.title: Mazuiyo seinsei (This Isn't Right, Teacher)
episodes.plot: Kei and Mizuho get married signing a contract, Konoha thinks that settle it all in paperwork is too sad, and then, she makes a ceremony,but during the ceremony Kei's friends show up for an unexpected visit. Kei must avoid being discovered, and close encounters of K9 kind.

episodes.title: Yappari suki kamo (Actually, I Think I Love You)
episodes.plot: In a dark move done by Ichigo Morino Kei and Koishi get set up on a date. A worried and jealous Mizuho finds out and she decides to follow them. Kei must now hide his marriage, while he's trying to contend with an emotional, jealousy (and of course, alien and teacher alike) wife.

episodes.title: Sonna sensei ni boku wa... (For That, Teacher, I...)
episodes.plot: Kei and Mizuho go to Okinawa and stay at a big hotel for their honeymoon. Unfortunately, things go wrong when they see Kei's friends turn up to stay at the same hotel. Two of Kei's friends begin to take steps beyond friendship, there's a little girl moving threads.These guys will teach you how to ruin a honeymoon.

episodes.title: Hajimatte kara hajimeyô (Let's Start From The Beginning)
episodes.plot: Meet the Kazami's. Kei and Mizuho get an unexpected awkward visit from Hatzuho, the strange Mizuho's mother and Maho an annoying sister with a thing in mind: Destroy to Mizuho's Husband. Meanwhile, a friend needs help in a hurry.

episodes.title: Nakanai de sensei (Don't Cry, Teacher)
episodes.plot: Maho Vs Kei, a misunderstanding that can be fatal.

episodes.title: Nagai yoru (Long Night)
episodes.plot: The path of love have roses thorns, and after an argument, it's time that Key and Mizuho face the truth. Can they say each other those three words?

episodes.title: Mô, owari ni shiyô (Let's End It Now)
episodes.plot: A secret is known, Ichigo and Kei have much in common. Ichigo finds out that Kei rejected Koishi's feelings so Ichigo tries to confront Kei but ends up in a standstill. Ichigo's secret is revealed to Kei who then leaves Mizuho to date Koishi so Ichigo doesn't end up in a standstill. A great love and a great sacrifice must be seen in this episode. Someone will have to give way.

episodes.title: Demo (But)
episodes.plot: A horrible game is discovered, many tears are being shed, Kei enter in the most serious of their stand stills and he may never return. Can true love heal the wounds?

episodes.title: Sensei (Teacher)
episodes.plot: Enter to Kei's Mind. While he is torn between life and death, a shocking story of his past is revealed, Will true love triumph beyond death?

episodes.title: Mô ichido teîchâ (One More Time, Teacher)
episodes.plot: She has sacrificed everything, mission, work and even his life to save her husband. Mizuho gets sent back to her planet but returns to Earth so she can be with Kei. but His memories of her are erased. Will this bittersweet love story have a happy ending?

episodes.title: Himitsu na futari (Secret Couple)
episodes.plot: The Kazamis is back! Maho and Hatsuho have come to help fan the flames of a marriage consumed in the routine. But they will make it in a non-orthodox way ... Can Kei and Mizuho achieve a desired happiness?
